input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: BCANActor

items The items XML used to perform action on an item within BMC Configuration Automation Networks Application.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values: login logout performBackup performCustomAction commit markAsTrustedByConfigDate mergeByConfigType mergeCompliantAllAssigned approveByJobID approveByChangeID approveByTaskID performExternalApproval sendJobSummaryReportEmail logCriticalEvent logInfoEvent logMajorEvent logMinorEvent logWarningEvent restoreByTemplateGroup mergeByAdhocTemplate mergeByTemplateGroup mergeCompliantByRule mergeCompliantByRuleSet validatePredefinedJobParameters submitJob deleteDevice
for version v8.9
executeComplianceJob importRules deleteUser
version The BMC Configuration Automation Networks Application version. The current supported version is v5.2 , v5.3 and v8.9

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> <soap-version></soap-version> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Perform Operations support following operations: Login Logout Perform Backup Perform Custom Action Mark As Trusted By Config Date Merge By Config Type Merge Compliant All Assigned Approve By Job ID Approve By Change ID Approve By Task ID Perform External Approval Send Job Summary Report Email Log Critical Event Log Info Event Log Major Event Log Minor Event Log Warning Event Commit Restore By Template Group Merge By Adhoc Template Merge By Template Group Merge Compliant By Rule Merge Compliant By Rule Set Validate Predefined Job Parameters Submit Job Delete Device
